> [@coreui/angular v3](https://coreui.io/angular) library project  
> for use with [CoreUI v3 Angular Admin Template](https://coreui.io/angular/) Bootstrap Admin Template


#### Prerequisites
Before you begin, make sure your development environment includes `Node.jsÂ®` and an `npm` package manager.

###### Node.js
Angular 11 requires `Node.js` version 12 or later.

- To check your version, run `node -v` in a terminal/console window.
- To get `Node.js`, go to [nodejs.org](https://nodejs.org/).

###### Angular CLI
Install the Angular CLI globally using a terminal/console window.
```bash
npm install -g @angular/cli
```

### Installation
Go to the workspace folder and install `@coreui/angular` as a dependency.
```bash 
npm install @coreui/angular@next
```

See the GitHub [release history](https://github.com/coreui/coreui-angular/releases).
